    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_89417</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Blood plasma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blutplasma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plasma sanguin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Plasma de sangue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Plasma sanguigno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλάσμα αίματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plasma de sangre</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Fourth in a series of four illustrations showing the different components of blood. Shown here is the plasma where all blood cells are floating. This can be used as a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">blood</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">components</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pale yellow liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Plasma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Platelets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">red blood cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white blood cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viertel in einer Reihe von vier Abbildungen, 
welche die unterschiedlichen Bestandteile des Bluts zeigen. Hier
gezeigt das Plasma, wo alle Blutzellen schwimmen. Dieses kann 
als beschriftende Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quart dans une série de quatre illustrations 
montrant les différents composants du sang. Montré ici est le 
plasma où toutes les cellules de sang flottent. Ceci peut être
utilisé comme exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fourth em uma série de quatro ilustrações que 
mostram os componentes diferentes do sangue. É mostrado aqui o 
plasma onde todas as pilhas de sangue estão flutuando. Isto 
pode ser usado como um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quarto in serie di quattro illustrazioni che
mostrano i componenti differenti di anima. È indicato qui il 
plasma dove tutte le cellule di anima stanno galleggiando. Ciò 
può essere usata come esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέταρτο σε μία σειρά τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν διαφορετικά συστατικά του αίματος. Εμφανισμένο 
εδώ είναι το πλάσμα όπου όλα τα κύτταρα αίματος επιπλέουν. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuarto en una serie de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran los diversos componentes de la sangre. Se muestra aquí
el plasma donde todas las células de sangre están flotando. 
Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bestandteile</string>
          </keyword>
